profile_summary:
SandraViz is a seasoned statistician and versatile developer with a unique blend of technical expertise and creative vision. With a strong foundation in R and JavaScript, she excels in data analysis and visualisation, leveraging Svelte to craft intuitive, data-driven user experiences. Her prolific output on GitHub, comprising 12 public repositories, showcases her dedication to active development and collaboration. As a respected figure in her professional network, she has garnered a significant following, with 43 followers attesting to her influence and thought leadership in the field.

As a statistician with a passion for visualisation and design, SandraViz brings a distinctive perspective to the world of data analysis. Her work seamlessly converges technical skill and creative flair, yielding innovative solutions that distill complex data into actionable insights. With a keen eye for detail and a talent for problem-solving, she delivers high-quality results that exceed expectations. Whether navigating complex data landscapes or crafting elegant visual narratives, SandraViz is a reliable, adaptable, and forward-thinking professional who consistently delivers value through her technical expertise and collaborative approach.
